channel.title: Need help whit compiling!
channel.description:
i only can compile server whit all client.java files on the same place as the compiler self.. like detlascape -.- but richscape is much better its like the only server i can't compile :s the strangest thing is that i can compile it on other computers.. i fcuking h8 java , java sucks why doesprivate servers run on java java is alwase against me.. i wish i can reward the 1 who can help me geuss nobody can help me whit this-.- i downloaded java JDK 1.7.0 en the 1.6.0_11 but if i change the compiler to Code: [code]@echo off title Compiling... cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java[/code] pauseor 1.6.0_11 then it just don't work?! it says :
The device is not ready. Press any key to continue. . .
en the strangest thing is , i compiled long time befire whit 1.7.0!! it just happen i really don't know what possably can be risten of this!

item.title: Need help whit compiling!
item.dc:creator: @Beasty_x Beasty_x
item.description:
@Beasty_x wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:8, topic:252799”][code]
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

[/code]

there[/quote] Srr man same problem : javac: file not found: *. java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use-help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue. . .

Read full topic

item.title: Need help whit compiling!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

@echo off
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

there

Read full topic

item.title: Need help whit compiling!
item.dc:creator: @Beasty_x Beasty_x
item.description:
@Beasty_x wrote:

[quote=“Elvemage 0o, post:4, topic:252799”]use this Compile

Replace everything you have with this

[code]@echo off
title Elvemage 0o’s Compiler

:def
%b%== b5
%t%== t7
:main
cls

echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Compiler V1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo – Elvemage 0o’s Compiler
echo –
echo – commands below (no CAPS)
echo –
echo – Works with all jdk versions (not any jdk 5’s tho)
echo –
echo – only versions 6u1 - 6u12 (netbeans ok) and 7u1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- *** Main Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- com = compile ur server files.
echo ----
echo ---- run = run server (basically same thing as runserver.bat).
echo ----
echo ---- *** Seconhand Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- set = change settingz…
echo ----
echo ---- creds = My Creits
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- No Leechin!! unless all credits to Epic Owner
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

set /p mains=-- Select a cmd…-

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds
if %mains%==extra goto extra

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling server…
echo — Its Compiling time
echo — processing…
echo —
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo — checking java version ( 6u1 to 6u12) (7u1)
echo —(6u1-6u12 and 7u1 only!!)
echo —
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo — Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM10
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_10
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM08
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_08
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM07

goto main

:COM06

echo — Results:

echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM05
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_05
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_04
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_03
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM2
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_02
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo — version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found…
echo — go download java and try to get the latest version
pause
goto main

:extra
cls
title Elvemage 0o’s extraz
echo dont leech i beg please…
echo if you do give me like 50% creds?? please??
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo — Port:
echo — 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo — Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo — You Fail… l0l
pause
goto main
:RUN12
echo — Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

pause
goto main
:RUN11
echo — Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…

:RUN09

echo — You Fail… l0l… you Need JDK 1.6.0_xx or 1.7.0_01
pause
cls
goto main
title Elvemage 0o’s Compiler
:set
cls
echo — Enter commandz for BaCkGrOuNd CoLoR.
echo — B0 = Black
echo — B1 = Blue
echo — B2 = Green
echo — B3 = Cyan
echo — B4 = Red
echo — B5 = Purple
echo — B6 = Yellow
echo — B7 = White
echo — pick one
echo ----------------
echo — Enter commandz for TeXt cOlOr.
echo — T0 = Black
echo — T1 = Blue
echo — T2 = Green
echo — T3 = Cyan
echo — T4 = Red
echo — T5 = Purple
echo — T6 = Yellow
echo — T7 = White
echo — Pick one

set /p s= – uR cHoIcE:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Thanks to:
echo —
echo — Elvemage 0o, owner of edge-pk.zapto.org
echo —
echo — Owner of Epicscape v1 and edge-pk client v1
echo —
echo — Contact me at elvemage0o@live.com
echo —
echo — 100% credits – Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — If You need any server help contact me. im good at coding/ servers
echo —
echo — My Moparscape forums name is Elvemage 0o (zero then lowercase o)
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
pause
cls
goto main

[/code][/quote] [code]— Its Compiling time:)
— Processing …

— Checking java version (6u1 to 6:12) (7u1)
— (6u1-and 7u1 only 6:12!)

— Found JDK 1.6.0_12
— Results:
javac is not recognized as an internal
or external command, operable program or batch file.
Success — Yay! now were all happy!
Press any key to continue. . .[/code] Srr man it doesn’t work it can’t find my client.java files i think :s

Read full topic

item.title: Need help whit compiling!
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

why does everyone think we need such pointless compilers...Compilers are made for compiling...

idc about the design… it works ok… its good enough

Read full topic

item.title: Need help whit compiling!
item.dc:creator: @java_is_my_bitch1 java is my bitch.
item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

[quote=“Elvemage 0o, post:4, topic:252799”]use this Compile

Replace everything you have with this

[code]@echo off
title Elvemage 0o’s Compiler

:def
%b%== b5
%t%== t7
:main
cls

echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Compiler V1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo – Elvemage 0o’s Compiler
echo –
echo – commands below (no CAPS)
echo –
echo – Works with all jdk versions (not any jdk 5’s tho)
echo –
echo – only versions 6u1 - 6u12 (netbeans ok) and 7u1

echo ---- *** Seconhand Commands ***

set /p mains=-- Select a cmd…-

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set

:com
cls
title Compiling server…
echo — Its Compiling time
echo — processing…
echo —
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo — checking java version ( 6u1 to 6u12) (7u1)
echo —(6u1-6u12 and 7u1 only!!)
echo —
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)

IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13

SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin

javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!

title Elvemage 0o’s Compiler
:set
cls
echo — Enter commandz for BaCkGrOuNd CoLoR.
echo — B0 = Black
echo — B1 = Blue
echo — B2 = Green
echo — B3 = Cyan
echo — B4 = Red
echo — B5 = Purple
echo — B6 = Yellow
echo — B7 = White
echo — pick one
echo ----------------
echo — Enter commandz for TeXt cOlOr.
echo — T0 = Black
echo — T1 = Blue
echo — T2 = Green
echo — T3 = Cyan
echo — T4 = Red
echo — T5 = Purple
echo — T6 = Yellow
echo — T7 = White
echo — Pick one

set /p s= – uR cHoIcE:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Thanks to:
echo —
echo — Elvemage 0o, owner of edge-pk.zapto.org
echo —
echo — Owner of Epicscape v1 and edge-pk client v1
echo —
echo — Contact me at elvemage0o@live.com
echo —
echo — 100% credits – Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — If You need any server help contact me. im good at coding/ servers
echo —
echo — My Moparscape forums name is Elvemage 0o (zero then lowercase o)
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
pause
cls
goto main

[/code][/quote]why does everyone think we need such pointless compilers…Compilers are made for compiling…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help whit compiling!
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

use this Compile

Replace everything you have with this

[code]@echo off
title Elvemage 0o’s Compiler

:def
%b%== b5
%t%== t7
:main
cls

echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Compiler V1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo – Elvemage 0o’s Compiler
echo –
echo – commands below (no CAPS)
echo –
echo – Works with all jdk versions (not any jdk 5’s tho)
echo –
echo – only versions 6u1 - 6u12 (netbeans ok) and 7u1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- *** Main Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- com = compile ur server files.
echo ----
echo ---- run = run server (basically same thing as runserver.bat).
echo ----
echo ---- *** Seconhand Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- set = change settingz…
echo ----
echo ---- creds = My Creits
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- No Leechin!! unless all credits to Epic Owner
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

set /p mains=-- Select a cmd…-

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds
if %mains%==extra goto extra

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling server…
echo — Its Compiling time
echo — processing…
echo —
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo — checking java version ( 6u1 to 6u12) (7u1)
echo —(6u1-6u12 and 7u1 only!!)
echo —
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)

goto comerrorxxx

echo — B4 = Red
echo — B5 = Purple
echo — B6 = Yellow
echo — B7 = White
echo — pick one
echo ----------------
echo — Enter commandz for TeXt cOlOr.
echo — T0 = Black
echo — T1 = Blue
echo — T2 = Green
echo — T3 = Cyan
echo — T4 = Red
echo — T5 = Purple
echo — T6 = Yellow
echo — T7 = White
echo — Pick one

set /p s= – uR cHoIcE:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main

:creds
cls
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo — Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — Thanks to:
echo —
echo — Elvemage 0o, owner of edge-pk.zapto.org
echo —
echo — Owner of Epicscape v1 and edge-pk client v1
echo —
echo — Contact me at elvemage0o@live.com
echo —
echo — 100% credits – Elvemage 0o
echo —
echo — If You need any server help contact me. im good at coding/ servers
echo —
echo — My Moparscape forums name is Elvemage 0o (zero then lowercase o)
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
pause
cls
goto main

[/code]

item.title: Need help whit compiling!

item.description:
@IKICKASS wrote:

I suggest going to Java’s website and downloading the JDK 1.6.0 With Update 10, i havent had any problems with that, Update 11 has given me some trouble and i’ve never even heard of 1.7.0 so that must be fake (maybe you got ripped off), also make sure your Java is installed in C:\program files… and then change the path in the compiler to jdk1.6.0_10, But im assuming your using a 503 source?
